meaningMnemonic: The <kanji>wide</kanji> <kanji>island</kanji>... this isn't helpful on its own, but this wide island is <vocabulary>Hiroshima</vocabulary> (heard of it?). When you do the reading it will make more sense.
readingMnemonic: The reading is the kun'yomi readings of both of these which is what you learned with the individual kanji. Just make sure you know those readings and you'll be able to read this.
